Package model

Class Summary
Battle Class the handles the events of a battle.
CardDeck Class that represents the a card deck with a draw pile and a discard pile.
CardPlayManager A Singleton-type class that handles the playing of a card.
DoorDeck Class that represents the Door Card Deck with a draw pile and a discard pile.
DoorDeckFactory Class with static methods for building a Door Deck.
GM A Singleton class that provides methods for primary game handling.
Player Class that represents a player.
Randomizer Class that handles randomization and the simulation of a dice roll.
TreasureDeck Class that represents the Treasure Card Deck with a draw pile and a discard pile.
TreasureDeckFactory Class with static methods for building a Treasure Deck.
 

Enum Summary
Class Enumerator for character classes
GM.TurnPhase Enumerator for each stage of a player's turn.
PlayerType Enumerator for each type of player.
Race Enumerator for character races
